resources.string: Pak Random adalah seorang Game Developer
Pak Random bergelut di dalam pengembangan Indie Game pertamanya.
Pak Random berencana mengembangkan game nya dalam tenggat waktu 1 tahun.
Pak Random mengalami banyak kesulitan dalam proses pengembangannya.
Pak Random mencari tau ke berbagai platform dan senior dalam pengembangan game.
Pak Random sadar kalau membuat game ternyata tidak semudah itu.
Pak Random dapat mengatasi masalahnya 1 per 1.
Pak Random mulai berhasil menjaga kestabilan proses pengembangan game nya.
Pak Random berhasil merilis game buatannya dalam tenggat waktu yang ditentukan.
A person who works in the field of crafts can produce goods. Examples of handicraft products are jewelry, carvings, pottery, woven fabrics, to souvenirs.
Agriculturist is a type of work that gets results from agriculture. For example, fruit and vegetable farmers are planted in rice fields, fields, to mountainous areas.
Doctors include jobs that produce services. Doctors work and serve the interests of humanity. Doctors work to prevent, examine and treat sick patients.
Employees usually work in companies or government offices. They are needed for personnel and abilities according to their field of expertise.
Teachers are tasked with educating and teaching knowledge to students.
People who work in libraries include the type of work that produces services. The librarian is responsible for managing and providing services in the library.

Fisherman work to find fish in the sea. So, most of the fisherman live in areas near the coast. These catches will be resold to the market. Usually fishermen sell fish that are still fresh taken in the sea.
People who have the expertise to make clothes are called tailors. This job requires skills to cut fabrics, make patterns, and turn fabrics into clothes.

People breed livestock for resale. Examples of livestock are goats, cows, chickens, rabbits, cows, and ducks. The farm animals are treated to produce meat, eggs, milk, or skins which are sold in the market.
Soldiers are tasked with maintaining national security in the field of defense.
